document_data.caption: A map of Thay showing the Keep of Sorrows to the southwest.
document_data.name: Keep of Sorrows
document_data.mainbody: The '''Keep of Sorrows''' was a [[granite]] fortress, surrounded by a double ring of walls, that was said to be impregnable.
document_data.Geography: It was located in [[Thay]] to the south of the [[River Lapendrar]], right next to a cliff that encircled central Thay called the [[First Escarpment]], situated within the Tharch of [[Lapendrar]], north of the tripoint where the borders of Lapendrar, [[Priador]], and [[Tyraturos (tharch)|Tyraturos]] converged.
